info.description: This is a schema representing the NATS configuration data model.
info.title: NATS Configuration Data Model

Auth.title: Auth represents the authentication information for the Nats client.

BasicAuth.title: BasicAuth represents the basic authentication approach which contains a username and a password.

queue.description: Queue is used for queue subscription.

subject.description: Subject holds the name of the subject onto which messages are published.

url.description: URL to connect to Nats cluster, multiple urls could be separated by comma.

LocalObjectReference.description:
LocalObjectReference contains enough information to let you locate the
referenced object inside the same namespace.
+structType=atomic

name.description:
Name of the referent.
More info: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/overview/working-with-objects/names/#names
TODO: Add other useful fields. apiVersion, kind, uid?
+optional

SecretKeySelector.title: SecretKeySelector selects a key of a Secret.

key.description: The key of the secret to select from.  Must be a valid secret key.

name.description:
Name of the referent.
More info: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/overview/working-with-objects/names/#names
TODO: Add other useful fields. apiVersion, kind, uid?
+optional

optional.description:
Specify whether the Secret or its key must be defined
+optional

TLS.title: TLS defines the TLS configuration for the Nats client.
